body.bibl: Lange, Christian. “Ephrem, His School, and the Yawnaya: Some Remarks on the Early Syriac Versions of the New Testament.” In The Peshitta: Its Use in Literature and Liturgy. Papers Read at the Third Peshitta Symposium, edited by Robert Bas ter Haar Romeny, 159–75. Monographs of the Peshiṭta Institute Leiden 15. Leiden: Brill, 2006.
